title: Limeade(Agua de Limón)
instructions: Put the lime juice, sugar, lime peels, and 2 quarts of water in a large pitcher and mix well.
remarks: This “Agua de Limón” is best made with the small Key lime.  The Key limes have lots of juice and an intense flavor.
source: Seasons of My Heart, A Culinary Journey Through Oaxaca, Mexico by Susana Trilling, published by The Ballantine Publishing Group, © 1999 by Susana Trilling
